body: A sea singer of 6th level or higher can use performance to create a gust of wind. This wind lasts for as long as he continues his performance. He can extend this duration to 1 minute by playing for 5 consecutive rounds. This performance replaces suggestion.
name: Whistle the Wind
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Bard/Bard Archetypes/Sea Singer/Bardic Performance/Whistle the Wind
